events.message: I recently received my order but unfortunately I want to return the product and get a refund because it does not meet my expectations.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding returning the product for money back.
Support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the refund request submitted by the customer today.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund. Iâ€™m here to help you through the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and reason for the refund so that we can proceed with the return authorization?
My order number is 123456789. The product is not as described, and I would like to return it and get my money back as soon as possible.
Thank you for the details. We have approved your refund request and will send you a prepaid return label shortly so you can send the item back at no cost.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response. I will send the product back as soon as I get the return label.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was successfully processed and no further inquiries were made, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
